summary: The diff adds repo-safe local env handling (frontend/.gitignore), keeps env-based LLM configuration via VITE_* variables, and updates LLM_DEMO_SETUP.md and frontend/.env.example with Gemini instructions. However, the change set also appears to include many unrelated frontend feature/theme/auth changes beyond the requested local-testing configuration/documentation scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad frontend feature/theme/auth/dashboard changes beyond enabling local env-based Gemini testing and updating setup documentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly disallow changing the appâ€™s feature set beyond local testing configuration and documentation updates, but the diff summary indicates many unrelated files were modified (app shell, auth pages/hooks, dashboards, styling, prompts/types/parsers).
